General.Name: Yes Optoelectronics Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Yes Optoelectronics (Group) Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells various LCD products in Europe, the United States, Japan, and Korea. It offers LCD panels, COG type modules, TAB type modules, COB type modules, SMT type modules, and TFT products, as well as LED, OEM, shutter LCD, and E-INK display products. The company was formerly known as Yes Optoelectronics Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Yes Optoelectronics (Group) Co., Ltd. in February 2021. Yes Optoelectronics (Group) Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Anshan City, China.
